import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { Link, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { createProfile } from "../../redux/actions/profile"; const CreateProfile = ({ createProfile }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: "", website: "", location: "", status: "", skills: "", githubusername: "", bio: "", youtube: "", twitter: "", blog: "", linkedin: "", }); const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, youtube, twitter, blog, linkedin, } = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out!

Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. New York, NY)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs && (
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
)} Go Back
); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = { createProfile: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; export default connect(null, { createProfile })(CreateProfile);
